pastEvents.title: UI/UX Design Hackathon
pastEvents.description: Are you ready to push the boundaries of design and innovation? Join the UI/UX Design Hackathon, organized by Students Union CEV, where creativity meets problem-solving!.

pastEvents.title: A Quick Fireside Chat with Ananya R
pastEvents.description: Join Ananya R - TEDx Speaker, DEI Advocate & Former Google DevRel Community Manager - for an unfiltered, high-energy talk on leadership, diversity & breaking barriers!.

pastEvents.title: Industry-Academia Meet
pastEvents.description: STUDENTS UNION and IEDC CEV organized a program empowering women entrepreneurs, featuring inspiring success stories, strategies for overcoming challenges, and mentorship opportunities.

pastEvents.title: Bug Bounty
pastEvents.description: CS Association conducted a Bug Bounty workshop in collaboration with Redteam Hacker Academy, Kozhikode, as part of Quasso Liberum Technical Fest at College of Engineering Vadakara.

pastEvents.title: Talk Session
pastEvents.description: Career talk session by Hafis C P, providing insights into job opportunities, emerging tech trends, and career growth in the IT sector.

pastEvents.title: Association Day
pastEvents.description: CS Association Day celebration featuring tech talks, workshops, and interactive sessions on emerging trends in computing.

pastEvents.title: Web Development Workshop
pastEvents.description: An interactive workshop on modern web development technologies and frameworks.

pastEvents.title: IoT Innovation Day
pastEvents.description: A day-long event focused on Internet of Things applications and innovations.

departmentAchievements.title: Best Department Award
departmentAchievements.description: The CSE Department won the Best Department Award at the Engineering Excellence Awards for outstanding academic and extracurricular achievements.

departmentAchievements.title: Smart India Hackathon Winners
departmentAchievements.description: A team of CSE students won the Smart India Hackathon 2023 by developing an innovative solution for sustainable urban mobility.

departmentAchievements.title: Research Excellence Award
departmentAchievements.description: The department received recognition for publishing the highest number of research papers in reputed international journals among all engineering colleges in the region.

departmentAchievements.title: Industry Partnership Award
departmentAchievements.description: The CSE department was recognized for establishing strong industry partnerships resulting in internships, placements, and collaborative research projects.

departmentAchievements.title: ACM Coding Competition Regional Winners
departmentAchievements.description: CSE students secured first place in the ACM Coding Competition at the regional level, qualifying for the national finals.

departmentAchievements.title: Best Technical Project Exhibition
departmentAchievements.description: The department's final year projects exhibition was recognized as the Best Technical Exhibition by the State Technical Education Board.

departmentAchievements.title: NASSCOM Technical Innovation Award
departmentAchievements.description: A group of students from the department received the NASSCOM Technical Innovation Award for their project on AI-based healthcare solutions.

departmentAchievements.title: Best Technical Symposium
departmentAchievements.description: The department's annual technical symposium 'TechVista 2022' was awarded as the Best Technical Symposium among engineering colleges in the state.

departmentAchievements.title: IEEE Student Branch Excellence Award
departmentAchievements.description: The IEEE Student Branch of the department received the Excellence Award for organizing quality technical events and workshops throughout the year.

departmentAchievements.title: Outstanding Placement Performance
departmentAchievements.description: The department achieved 95% placement rate for the academic year 2021-22, with students being placed in top multinational companies.

departmentAchievements.title: National Technical Quiz Champions
departmentAchievements.description: A team of CSE students won the National Technical Quiz Championship organized by the Indian Society of Technical Education.

departmentAchievements.title: Best Technical Paper Award
departmentAchievements.description: Faculty and students from the department received the Best Technical Paper Award at the International Conference on Advanced Computing Technologies.
